page.title: 12HAULAGE CONTRACTORS
page.content: {OWNERS }R.A ROUSELL M.R.A ROUSELL RA ROUSELL AND M.R.A ROUSELL STARTED THE BUSINESS IN 1965 {EQUIPMENT}2 10 TON LEYLAND LORRIES, 3 16 TON LEYLAND LORRIES,1 20 TON LEYLAND LORRY,2 LANDROVERS,1 ROVER CAR.(AGE OF LORRIES=6-14 YEARS OLD). MAX.SPEED=70 M.P.H,LORRIES USE 25 GALLONS OF DIESEL PER DAY. {EMPLOYEES}6 DRIVERS-NAMES=R.A ROUSELL M.RA ROUSELL,DOUG LIMMER,TED BACON,JIM LUKINS,PHILIP TINCKNELL { {STORAGE}WORKSHOP {PARTS}TOOLS,TYRES AND ENGINE PARTS FROM LEYLAND MOTORS. {LOADS}LIME TO PORT TALBOT STEEL WORKS AND LLANWERN STEEL WORKS FROM CHEDDAR. TARMAC TO WEYMOUTH & CHRISTCHURCH.GRIT FROM BOURNEMOUTH BACK TO PANBOROUGH PEAT WORKS.SCALPINGS TO BRISTOL. SAND TO CHEDDAR RESERVOIR.SMALL LOCAL LOADS OF STONE AND SOIL REMOVAL.
